data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 23 believers in the state of Dolneni.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Dolneni, North Macedonia
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Dolneni, North Macedonia to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Dolneni, North Macedonia need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Dolneni, North Macedonia from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Albanian, Macedonian people might believe through him.
Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Dolneni, North Macedonia, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Dolneni, North Macedonia humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.section_summary:
the state of Dolneni, North Macedonia has a population of 14,000.

We estimate Dolneni has 23 people who might know Jesus, 8,653 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 5,324 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 608 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the state of Dolneni, North Macedonia. Please, stir the 23 believers here to pray for awakening.
